name: compatibly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
happily or successfully together: Is it possible for humans to live compatibly with animals?
in a way that works with a particular type of computer, machine, device, etc.: A common language and protocols make it possible for computers to work together compatibly. See
compatible
More examplesFewer examplesThe industrial and residential uses have coexisted compatibly for decades.Officials from the salmon and tourism industries discussed how both sides might exist compatibly.He has exceeded his powers if he fails to act compatibly with the Human Rights Convention.You need a means for compatibly connecting the ultrasonic diagnostic system to the Internet.Java software allows applications to run reliably and compatibly with an array of different network products.
